title: Workshop on Designing Accelerated Concept Acquisition Strategies for Elementary Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented course for pre-service teachers and educational experts to analyze elementary students' concrete concept acquisition processes and develop effective instructional designs.

learning_goals: Learners can independently create instructional designs for elementary studentsâ€™ math concept learning using task analysis procedures.
Learners can develop assessment tools by categorizing concept acquisition levels into two dimensions (basic/advanced).
Learners can implement a follow-up evaluation design two months later to verify learning transfer effects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
